other_title: Jornada Encantada - A Procura da Liberdade (Portuguese)
plot: Glick, a city squirrel, joins his friends to take a journey back to the forest they came from.
opening_theme: "Jiyū no Mori e - To Forest of Freedom" (自由の森へ TO FOREST OF FREEDOM) by Rui Tachihara and Yukari Kujirai
ending_theme: "Jiyū no Mori e - To Forest of Freedom" (自由の森へ TO FOREST OF FREEDOM) by Rui Tachihara and Yukari Kujirai
